{{Description|The way of the adepti is not defined only by the mysterious and fantastical. Only by observing the changes in the heavens and the earth, and understanding the laws of cause and effect in this realm, may its essence be understood.}}
'''Divine Maiden's Deliverance''' is [[Shenhe]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The DoT hits '''12''' times.
** Inflicts a total damage (including the initial hit) of: '''498%''' at level 1; '''897%''' at level 10.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|character=Shenhe|talent=Divine Maiden's Deliverance|ascension|1|Deific Embrace}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|2|Centered Spirit|Increases the duration of this talent by 6 seconds, and increases the {{Cryo}} CRIT DMG of characters within the field by 15%.}}
** This causes the DoT to hit '''6''' more times (for a total of '''18''' times), inflicting a total damage (including the initial hit) of: '''707%''' at level 1; '''1255%''' at level 10; '''1481%''' at level 13.
* {{Talent Note|constellation|5|Divine Attainment}}
